body: Grasshopper Eyes The Potomac is "dumbstruck and saddened...[by] the weekend’s shootings of Congressional representative, Gabrielle Giffords, and the killing of six other people in that attack in Tucson."
original_body: Grasshopper Eyes The Potomac is "dumbstruck and saddened...[by] the weekend’s shootings of Congressional representative, Gabrielle Giffords, and the killing of six other people in that attack in Tucson."
title: Jamaica, U.S.A.: The Tucson Attack
